name: Bob&Rod's: VR Carnival Experience
description: With Bob&Rod’s, our goal is to simulate the experience of a fun-filled carnival in a VR environment. Each booth is inspired by classic carnival games. At Bob&Rod’s the user is able to enjoy Angry Birds, Put a Ring On It!, and Food Fight. Hit cans, slide in rings, and take down dummy enemies. Rank up in points to test and perfect your carnival skills!
